title: Marco Pierre White Jr sparks concern as he sleeps on bench with bottle of vodka after boozy night
text:
Marco Pierre White Jr sparks concern as he sleeps on bench with bottle of vodka after boozy night The former Celebrity Big Brother star looked worse for wear Share Marco Pierre White Jr drunk on a park bench (Photo: Copyright unknown) Share   Thank you for subscribing!   
Marco Pierre White Jr has sparked concerns after he was seen slumped on a park bench with a bottle of vodka in his hand after a wild night out. 
The former Celebrity Big Brother housemate - who previously caused controversy after admitting to spending £200,000 on a three month booze and drugs binge - appeared worse for wear when he was seen early on Tuesday morning in a London park. 
In the worrying snaps - taken after a night out partying - the tattooed son of celebrity chef Marco Pierre White can be seen swigging from the bottle. Marco Pierre White Jr was spotted early morning in a park in London (Photo: Greg Brennan) He was seen sat on a park bench after a heavy night (Photo: Greg Brennan) Passersby saw him on the bench (Photo: Greg Brennan) 
Wearing sweat pants and a grey hoody pulled over his head, he was seen drinking as he walked through the park before finding a bench. 
He slumped down, appearing to read the vodka bottle. 
At one point, Marco Pierre appeared to have fallen asleep on the bench, lying face down with his leg and arm hanging off the side. The former Celebrity Big Brother housemate was seen swigging from the bottle (Photo: Greg Brennan) He appeared worse for wear (Photo: Greg Brennan) It looked to have been a hard night partying (Photo: Greg Brennan) 
The bottle could be seen on the ground next to him, while other pictures show passersby looking on. 
Speaking previously about having his allowance cut off after blowing £200,000 on the three-month binge, he showed no signs of stopping. 
He said: “He knows cutting me off doesn’t stop me. I’m the sort of guy who can walk into a bar without a penny in his pocket and still come out p***ed.” He has been open about his drinking in the past (Photo: Greg Brennan) He once admitted to spending £200,000 in three months on booze and drugs (Photo: Greg Brennan) Like us on Facebook
